post:
Choose MyRootPW to become your next web hosting provider.
The Shared Web-Hosting Offers take resources on powerful servers with
**SSD-Disks** and are managed by a state of the art Control-Panel.

You will get 99.9% uptime guaranteed, **FREE** LetsEncrypt **SSL** Certificates,
**1 Click-Wordpress** Installations and more!

Choose your **location** between the **USA, Netherlands and Austria** ! Starting at only 10 Euro per Year!

**Web-Hosting Plans:**

**Small**
**5 GB SSD** Storage
50 GB Traffic
5 User Accounts
1 MySQL Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 1 Website
=> Order this hosting Package: **[10 Euro / Year](https://myroot.pw/user/order/main/packages/SmallHosting/?group_id=19 "10 Euro / Year")**


**Medium**
**15 GB SSD** Storage
100 GB Traffic
10 User Accounts
3 MySQL Databases
1 Postgres Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 5 Website
=> Order this hosting Package: **[20 Euro / Year](https://myroot.pw/user/order/main/packages/RegularHosting/?group_id=20 "20 Euro / Year")**



**Large**
**30 GB SSD** Storage
200 GB Traffic
25 User Accounts
5 MySQL Databases
5 Postgres Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 10 Website
=> Order this hosting Package: **[40 Euro / Year](https://myroot.pw/user/order/main/packages/LargeHosting/?group_id=21 "40 Euro / Year")**

_All prices excl. VAT if applicable._
